column2:
**gln** - string (13); the GLN number of the organization that is associated with the authorized user of the EDIN 2.0 platform at the account level

**doc_type** - string; document type (`parameter description <https://wiki.edin.ua/en/latest/integration_2_0/APIv2/Methods/EveryBody/XDocPage.html#param-desc>`__)

The body of the request method transmit a document in JSON or XML or P7S format in binary form (`Request example <https://wiki.edin.ua/en/latest/integration_2_0/APIv2/Methods/EveryBody/CreateDocExample.html>`__ + `document specifications <https://wiki.edin.ua/en/latest/XML/XML-structure.html>`__)
